p: TTO (batch n. 140,208 year 2014), purchased from Primavera/Flora, Pisa, Italy as a distillation sample, was obtained from the fresh leaves of M. alternifolia. The essential oil composition was analyzed by GC-MS at Flora s.r.l. with a Clarus 500 gas chromatograph (Perkin Elmer, Milan, Italy). Terpinen-4-ol (CAS Number: 20126-76-5; ≥95.0% pure) (sum of enantiomers, GC) and γ-terpinene (CAS Number: 99-85-4; 97% pure) were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (Milan, Italia, s.r.l.) and used as received without any further purification.
